content:
i used size 20 thread and a 10 steel hook and size 10 thread and a six hook and size knit cro scheen vintage thread and a 10 hook use what ever size you are comfortable with or have on hand as i did the knit cro sheen usually i would have used a bigger hook i just kept my gauge loose so it would work too **if you like my blog and the free patterns and tutorials and want to say thank you i have a wish list on ravelry of patterns i would like to make
thank you in advance for being kind and
saying thank you back

love sunshine but please do not feel like you have to**
